p: According to Table 6, on the first and the 21st days, the pH of different herbal probiotic yogurt treatments did not differ significantly ( p < .05). The results show that the pH changes in herbal probiotic yogurts were significant in the control treatment over time ( t = 3.062 and p = .038). Over time, the pH in the control treatment ranging from 4.25 ± 0.10 to 4.00 ± 0.10 decreased. In other treatments, pH changes were not significant over time.
